attributes.action: Make it mandatory for every Citizen to be an Organ Donor
attributes.additional_details: I think that everyone should be an Organ Donor, purely because you will never know yourself whether you will need a lifesaving transplant e.g. Liver, Heart, Pancreas etc, which is useless to someone, when they are dead. By making it mandatory, there would be virtually no shortages in the supply of transplants, and waiting times would be reduced, therefore saving lives.
